author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-1058 : Removal of Console WriteLine as highlighted in code review by Robert Godfrey.

author: dwoods
msg: GERONIMO-3930 The maximum size of each tran log file is 2 gigs (HOWL needs to index using an integer). The default max size will now be 2 megs. The default buffer size was 32k, which is pretty large (typically would have a lot of wasted space). I've bumped it down to 4k.

author: elecharny
msg: Added some javadoc and minor code refactoring for clarity sake

author: elecharny
msg: Replaced a generic NamingException by a more specific exception to avoid a server breakage.
